item.title: PLSE_Math_week04_05
item.author: tedliuzy@hotmail.com (TED LZY)
item.description: This week’s objectives Review last week’s contents. Review last week’s homework. Test out the virtual classroom capability. Practice on the topic fraction. Background Main difference happened this week is the pandemic became worse, virtual session is advised for turtoring. Realized the student’s basic theory is weak, he doesn’t quite understand how fraction works and how to apply the formula. Procedure Researched about how to carry online session.
item.dc:creator: TED LZY

item.title: PLSE_Math_week02_03
item.author: tedliuzy@hotmail.com (TED LZY)
item.description: This week’s objectives Review last week’s contents Study this week’s school materials. Practice on the weakness of the pupils. Background After the first week’s session, get to know the kid and understand he is very weak in Math and the time left for preparing exam is only five months. Realized the student’s calculation ability is weak, he is still counting fingers when encounter any calculation. Student is shy but willing to learn and listen to instructions which is good.
item.dc:creator: TED LZY

item.title: PLSE_Math_week01
item.author: tedliuzy@hotmail.com (TED LZY)
item.description: SG care volunteer program This is a volunteer programm for Primary School Leaving Examinatio (PSLE) Maths Coaching Initiative. Target audience Student with D and E grades For families with per capita inciome of S$450 and below Objective To achieve at least an AL6 for the students' MATH exam This week’s objectives It is the first week of this program, the expectation of myself is to get to know the student; set up a goal for the kid.
item.dc:creator: TED LZY
